original_text: And what will happen to you people in Capernaum? You think that God will lift you up to heaven, do you? No! He will throw you down to Hades, the place for dead people. I did powerful things in your town. If I had done these powerful things in Sodom, it would still be there today.
korean_text: 가버나움아 네가 하늘에까지 높아지겠느냐 음부에까지 낮아지리라 네게 행한 모든 권능을 소돔에서 행하였더라면 그 성이 오늘까지 있었으리라

sentences.original_text: And what will happen to you people in Capernaum?
sentences.korean_translation: 가버나움에 있는 너희에게 무슨 일이 일어날까?

sentences.original_text: You think that God will lift you up to heaven, do you?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 하나님이 너희를 하늘로 들어 올릴 거라고 생각하느냐?

sentences.original_text: He will throw you down to Hades,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 너희를 하데스로 던져 버릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I did powerful things in your town.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 동네에서 강한 일들을 행했다.

sentences.original_text: If I had done these powerful things in Sodom,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 강한 일들을 소돔에서 행했다면,

sentences.original_text: it would still be there today.
